author: dkulp
msg: [CXF-3962,CXF-3901] Make sure the bus.initialize() is called when it
really is initialized.   Have OSGi pull Features and Listeners from the
OSGi service registry at Bus startup.
CXF-3963 set up maven-site-plugin 3.0. Don't work yet.
CXF-3964: simplify code. The maven-artifact-resolver is the right API for what this is trying to do.
This doesn't make the M3 bug disappear, but it makes this code easier to read.
